name: dbus
title: DBus
description: Explore objects exposed by DBus using a pleasant and search-focused interface

preferences.name: ignore-standard-interfaces
preferences.title: Ignore standard interfaces
preferences.label: Ignore standard interfaces
preferences.description: Ignore standard org.freedesktop.DBus interfaces. These interfaces are present on every introspectable node and can generate a lot of noise and nesting. Turning this on will compact the navigation, making it meaningfully easier to discover noteworthy objects.
